name: .K25
summary: Learn about .K25 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a K25 file with Microsoft Photos, XnViewMP, or Corel AfterShot Pro, to view and edit the image it contains.
If you want to make extensive edits to the image your K25 file contains, you should open it with AfterShot Pro, as that program contains professional-level photo editing tools.
You can use XnViewMP, Logipole Konvertor, and ReaSoft Development ReaConverter to convert K25 files to other image formats, such as .JPG, .PNG, and .BMP.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .k25 file in XnViewMP
images.caption: K25 file open in XnViewMP
